ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: It all started with a blog comment.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: இது அனைத்தும் ஒரு வலைப்பதிவு கருத்துடன் தொடங்கியது.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: Esta bien

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: On December 8, 2020, Red Hat announced that they would discontinue development of CentOS, which has been a production-ready downstream version of Red Hat Enterprise Linux, in favor of a newer upstream development variant of that operating system known as "CentOS Stream". In response, original founder of CentOS, Gregory Kurtzer, announced <0>via a comment on the CentOS website</0> that he would again start a project to achieve the original goals of CentOS. It's name was chosen as a tribute to early CentOS co-founder Rocky McGaugh. By December 12, the code repository of Rocky Linux had become the top-trending repository on GitHub.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: டிசம்பர் 8, 2020 அன்று, Red Hat ஆனது "சென்டோச் ச்ட்ரீம்" எனப்படும் இயங்குதளத்தின் புதிய அப்ஸ்ட்ரீம் டெவலப்மெண்ட் மாறுபாட்டிற்கு ஆதரவாக Red Hat Enterprise Linux இன் உற்பத்திக்கு தயாராக உள்ள கீழ்நிலை பதிப்பான CentOS இன் வளர்ச்சியை நிறுத்துவதாக அறிவித்தது. இதற்கு பதிலளிக்கும் விதமாக, CentOS இன் அசல் நிறுவனர் கிரிகோரி கர்ட்சர், CentOS இன் அசல் இலக்குகளை அடைய மீண்டும் ஒரு திட்டத்தைத் தொடங்குவதாக CentOS இணையதளத்தில் ஒரு கருத்து மூலம் அறிவித்தார். இதன் பெயர் ஆரம்பகால CentOS இணை நிறுவனர் ராக்கி மெக்காவுக்கு அஞ்சலி செலுத்தும் வகையில் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கப்பட்டது. டிசம்பர் 12 ஆம் தேதிக்குள், ராக்கி லினக்ஸின் குறியீடு களஞ்சியம் GitHub இல் மிகவும் பிரபலமான களஞ்சியமாக மாறியது.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: </0>. The slash in the label is redundant

Hello @jimcat8! I'm not seeing a duplicate </0> in the source string. Care to clarify your concern?
The presence of <0> and </0> in source strings indicate that the content within those tags will have a link injected into it. Translations should include this in their native strings to ensure the links show up properly in different locales.
@ressonix I mean, the format in the Chinese translation is wrong, not the original English
I see. You should be able to edit the translated string with the correct translation and I can approve it afterwards. :)
You can see
I've revised it. You can approve it

Thank you for checking this translation. I translated this sentence again.Please review my translation: "2020年12月8日、レッドハットは、Red Hat Enterprise Linuxのダウンストリーム版として製品化されてきたCentOSの開発を中止し、「CentOS Stream」として知られるオペレーティングシステムの新しいアップストリーム開発方式を採用すると発表しました。これを受けて、CentOSの初代創設者であるGregory Kurtzer氏は、<0>CentOSのウェブサイトのコメント</0>を通じて、CentOSの本来の目的を達成するためのプロジェクトを再び立ち上げると発表しました。そのプロジェクト名は、初期のCentOSの共同創設者であるRocky McGaugh氏へのオマージュとして選ばれました。12月12日までに、Rocky LinuxのコードリポジトリはGitHubのトップトレンドリポジトリとなりました。"
The current translation is mainland-China style, which is not suitable for "zh_TW".

The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Am 8. Dezember 2020, kündigte Red Hat an, dass sie die Entwicklung von CentOS einstellen würden, die eine produktionsfähige Downstream-Version von Red Hat Enterprise Linux war, zu Gunsten einer neuen Upstream Entwicklungsvariante von diesem System gennant "CentOS Stream". Als Reaktion darauf gründete der ursprüngliche Entwickler von CentOS, Gregory Kurtzler, <0>durch einen Kommentar auf der CentOS Webseite</0> angekündigt hat, dass er erneut ein Projekt starten werde, um die ursprünglichen Ziele von CentOS zu erreichen. Der Name wurde als Tribute an den frühen CentOS-Mitgründer Rocky McGaugh gewählt. Bis zum 12. Dezember war das Repository von Rocky Linux zum Top-Trend-Repository auf GitHub geworden."

The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Am 8. Dezember 2020, kündigte Red Hat an, dass sie die Entwicklung von CentOS einstellen würden, die eine produktionsfähige Downstream-Version von Red Hat Enterprise Linux war, zu Gunsten einer neuen Upstream Entwicklungsvariante von diesem System gennant "CentOS Stream". Als Reaktion darauf gründete der ursprüngliche Entwickler von CentOS, Gregory Kurtzer, <0>durch einen Kommentar auf der CentOS Webseite</0> angekündigt hat, dass er erneut ein Projekt starten werde, um die ursprünglichen Ziele von CentOS zu erreichen. Der Name wurde als Tribute an den frühen CentOS-Mitgründer Rocky McGaugh gewählt. Bis zum 12. Dezember war das Repository von Rocky Linux zum Top-Trend-Repository auf GitHub geworden."

The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "8 декабря 2020 года компания Red Hat объявила о прекращении разработки CentOS, являвшейся готовой для производственных целей пересборкой Red Hat Enterprise Linux, в пользу более нового варианта разработки, известного как "CentOS Stream". В ответ основатель CentOS Грегори Куртцер <0>в комментарии на сайте CentOS</0> заявил о готовности вновь основать проект для достижения первоначальных целей CentOS. Название было выбрано как дань уважения раннему сооснователю CentOS Рокки МакГауту. К 12 декабря репозиторий кода Rocky Linux стал самым популярным репозиторием на GitHub."

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: On December 22, 2020, Rocky Linux announced that the target for an initial release was anywhere between March and May of 2021. On January 20, 2021, it was announced that a test repository would be made available to the public by the end of February, and a release candidate was on target for the end of March 2021. However, that date was slightly pushed back, and on April 30, 2021, the first release candidate was officially released. The second release candidate, of version 8.4, the last before the stable release, was released on June 4, 2021. On June 21, 2021, the stable release of Rocky Linux 8.4 was released, with the code name "Green Obsidian".
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: டிசம்பர் 22, 2020 அன்று, ராக்கி லினக்ஸ் ஆரம்ப வெளியீட்டிற்கான இலக்கு 2021 மார்ச் மற்றும் மே மாதங்களுக்கு இடையில் இருக்கும் என்று அறிவித்தது. ஜனவரி 20, 2021 அன்று, பிப்ரவரி இறுதிக்குள் சோதனைக் களஞ்சியம் பொதுமக்களுக்குக் கிடைக்கும் என்று அறிவிக்கப்பட்டது. 2021 மார்ச் இறுதிக்குள் ஒரு வெளியீட்டு வேட்பாளர் இலக்காக இருந்தார். இருப்பினும், அந்தத் தேதி சற்று பின்னுக்குத் தள்ளப்பட்டது, ஏப்ரல் 30, 2021 அன்று, முதல் வெளியீட்டு வேட்பாளர் அதிகாரப்பூர்வமாக வெளியிடப்பட்டது. நிலையான வெளியீட்டிற்கு முந்தைய கடைசி பதிப்பு 8.4 இன் இரண்டாவது வெளியீடு ஜூன் 4, 2021 அன்று வெளியிடப்பட்டது. ஜூன் 21, 2021 அன்று, ராக்கி லினக்ஸ் 8.4 இன் நிலையான வெளியீடு "கிரீன் அப்சிடியன்" என்ற குறியீட்டு பெயருடன் வெளியிடப்பட்டது.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Am 22. Dezember 2020 gab Rocky Linux bekannt, dass das Ziel für eine erste Veröffentlichung zwischen März und Mai 2021 war. Am 20. Januar 2021 wurde angekündigt, dass bis Ende Februar ein Testarchiv veröffentlicht werden soll und ein Veröffentlichungskandidat für Ende März 2021 vorgesehen war. Dieses Datum wurde jedoch leicht verschoben, und am 30. April 2021 wurde der erste Veröffentlichungskandidat offiziell freigegeben. Der zweite Release Kandidat der Version 8.4, das letzte vor dem stabilen Release, wurde am 4. Juni 2021 veröffentlicht. Am 21. Juni 2021 wurde die stabile Version von Rocky Linux 8.4 mit dem Namen "Green Obsidian" veröffentlicht."

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: The Rocky Linux project is hosted by the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation (RESF). To learn more about the organizational structure, please check out the <0>page</0> on the topic.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: ராக்கி லினக்ஸ் திட்டம் ராக்கி எண்டர்பிரைஸ் மென்பொருள் அறக்கட்டளையால் (RESF) நடத்தப்படுகிறது. நிறுவன அமைப்பைப் பற்றி மேலும் அறிய, தலைப்பில் உள்ள <0>பக்கத்தைப்<ழ0> பார்க்கவும்.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Thinking back to early CentOS days... My cofounder was Rocky McGaugh. He is no longer with us, so as a H/T to him, who never got to see the success that CentOS came to be, I introduce to you...Rocky Linux.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: ஆரம்பகால CentOS நாட்களை நினைத்துப் பார்க்கிறேன்... எனது இணை நிறுவனர் ராக்கி மெக்காக். அவர் இப்போது எங்களுடன் இல்லை, எனவே அவருக்கு ஒரு H/T என்ற முறையில், CentOS உருவான வெற்றியைப் பார்க்க முடியாத அவருக்கு, நான் உங்களுக்கு அறிமுகப்படுத்துகிறேன்... ராக்கி லினக்ஸ்.
இணை நிறுவனர் @ சென்டோஸ் / நிறுவனர் @ ராக்கி லினக்ஸ்

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: The images provided on this page are available from one of our trusted mirrors, but aren't officially supported.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: இந்தப் பக்கத்தில் வழங்கப்பட்ட படங்கள் எங்களின் நம்பகமான கண்ணாடிகளில் ஒன்றிலிருந்து கிடைக்கின்றன, ஆனால் அவை அதிகாரப்பூர்வமாக ஆதரிக்கப்படவில்லை.

my opinion: we should always use ISO format for dates YYYY-MM-DD instead of those confusing formats for instance: DD/MM/YYYY or MM/DD/YYYY
In German the therm "Images" is normally not directly translated, but just left as "Images".

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: As you download and use Rocky Linux, the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation invites you to <0>be a part of the community as a contributor</0>. There are many ways to contribute to the project, from documentation, QA, and testing to coding changes for SIGs, providing mirroring or hosting, and helping other users.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: நீங்கள் ராக்கி லினக்ஸைப் பதிவிறக்கம் செய்து பயன்படுத்தும் போது, ராக்கி எண்டர்பிரைஸ் மென்பொருள் அறக்கட்டளை உங்களைப் <0> பங்களிப்பாளராக சமூகத்தின் ஒரு பகுதியாக இருக்கும்படி அழைக்கிறது</0>. திட்டத்திற்கு பங்களிக்க பல வழிகள் உள்ளன, ஆவணப்படுத்தல், QA மற்றும் சோதனையிலிருந்து SIGகளுக்கான குறியீட்டு மாற்றங்கள், பிரதிபலிப்பு அல்லது ஹோஸ்டிங் வழங்குதல் மற்றும் பிற பயனர்களுக்கு உதவுதல்.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Поскольку вы скачиваете и используете Rocky Linux, Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation приглашает вас <0>стать частью сообщества</0>. Существует множество способов внести свой вклад в проект: от документации, QA и тестирования до разработки изменений для SIG, предоставления зеркала или хостинга, а также помощи другим пользователям."
@ressonix This one is grammatically not correct.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: What's the difference between the ISOs?
Various installation images are available for installing Rocky Linux. Which image you need to download depends on your installation environment and use-case.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: ராக்கி லினக்ஸை நிறுவுவதற்கு பல்வேறு நிறுவல் படங்கள் உள்ளன. எந்தப் படத்தை நீங்கள் பதிவிறக்க வேண்டும் என்பது உங்கள் நிறுவல் சூழல் மற்றும் பயன்பாட்டு வழக்கைப் பொறுத்தது.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: @ressonix grammatically incorrect

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Used to install the operating system from another source (such as a HTTP repository of the binary files). Can also be used to enter Rescue Mode.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: இயக்க முறைமையை வேறொரு மூலத்திலிருந்து நிறுவப் பயன்படுகிறது (பைனரி கோப்புகளின் HTTP களஞ்சியம் போன்றவை). மீட்பு பயன்முறையில் நுழைவதற்கும் பயன்படுத்தலாம்.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Used to install the operating system from another source (such as a HTTP repository of the binary files). Can also be used to enter Rescue Mode.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: இயக்க முறைமையை வேறொரு மூலத்திலிருந்து நிறுவப் பயன்படுகிறது (பைனரி கோப்புகளின் HTTP களஞ்சியம் போன்றவை). மீட்பு பயன்முறையில் நுழைவதற்கும் பயன்படுத்தலாம்.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: A full installation that contains the BaseOS and AppStream repositories and allows you to complete the installation without additional repositories. Installing Rocky Linux from the DVD ISO is the easiest and most common method of performing a standard Rocky Linux 8 installation.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: BaseOS மற்றும் AppStream களஞ்சியங்களைக் கொண்ட முழு நிறுவல் மற்றும் கூடுதல் களஞ்சியங்கள் இல்லாமல் நிறுவலை முடிக்க உங்களை அனுமதிக்கிறது. டிவிடி ஐஎஸ்ஓவிலிருந்து ராக்கி லினக்ஸை நிறுவுவது நிலையான ராக்கி லினக்ஸ் 8 நிறுவலைச் செய்வதற்கான எளிதான மற்றும் மிகவும் பொதுவான முறையாகும்.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "BaseOSとAppStreamリポジトリを含んでおり、追加リポジトリなしでインストールを完了することができるフルインストールです。 DVD ISOからRockyLinuxをインストールすることは、標準のRocky Linux8インストールを実行する最も簡単で一般的な方法です。 "
@koizumistr Thank you for checking. I did typo.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Find our official images from your favorite cloud provider.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: உங்களுக்குப் பிடித்த மேகம் வழங்குநரிடமிருந்து எங்கள் அதிகாரப்பூர்வ படங்களைக் கண்டறியவும்.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Finden Sie unsere offiziellen Images von Ihrem bevorzugten Cloud-Anbieter."

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Download the official release of Rocky from one of our trusted mirrors.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: எங்கள் நம்பகமான கண்ணாடியிலிருந்து ராக்கியின் அதிகாரப்பூர்வ வெளியீட்டைப் பதிவிறக்கவும்.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: As you download and use Rocky, the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation invites you to <0>be a part of the community as a contributor</0>. There are many ways to contribute to the project, from documentation, QA, and testing to coding changes for SIGs, providing mirroring or hosting, and helping other users.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: நீங்கள் ராக்கி லினக்ஸைப் பதிவிறக்கம் செய்து பயன்படுத்தும் போது, ராக்கி எண்டர்பிரைஸ் மென்பொருள் அறக்கட்டளை உங்களைப் <0> பங்களிப்பாளராக சமூகத்தின் ஒரு பகுதியாக இருக்கும்படி அழைக்கிறது</0>. திட்டத்திற்கு பங்களிக்க பல வழிகள் உள்ளன, ஆவணப்படுத்தல், QA மற்றும் சோதனையிலிருந்து SIGகளுக்கான குறியீட்டு மாற்றங்கள், பிரதிபலிப்பு அல்லது ஹோஸ்டிங் வழங்குதல் மற்றும் பிற பயனர்களுக்கு உதவுதல்.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: Please review my translation as this grammer fits better on native speakers: "當您下載與使用 Rocky 時，RESF（Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation，Rocky 企業軟體基金會）邀請您<0>成為社群的一名貢獻者</0>。有許多方式可以為專案做出貢獻，包含使用者文件、品質確認、測試SIG（Special interest group，特別興趣小組）程式碼變更、提供鏡像或代管，以及協助其他使用者。"

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: What's the difference between the ISOs?
Various installation images are available for installing Rocky. Which image you need to download depends on your installation environment and use-case.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: ராக்கி லினக்ஸை நிறுவுவதற்கு பல்வேறு நிறுவல் படங்கள் உள்ளன. எந்தப் படத்தை நீங்கள் பதிவிறக்க வேண்டும் என்பது உங்கள் நிறுவல் சூழல் மற்றும் பயன்பாட்டு வழக்கைப் பொறுத்தது.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Used to install the operating system from another source (such as a HTTP repository of the binary files). Can also be used to enter Rescue Mode.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: இயக்க முறைமையை வேறொரு மூலத்திலிருந்து நிறுவப் பயன்படுகிறது (பைனரி கோப்புகளின் HTTP களஞ்சியம் போன்றவை). மீட்பு பயன்முறையில் நுழைவதற்கும் பயன்படுத்தலாம்.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Used to install the operating system from another source (such as a HTTP repository of the binary files). Can also be used to enter Rescue Mode.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: இயக்க முறைமையை வேறொரு மூலத்திலிருந்து நிறுவப் பயன்படுகிறது (பைனரி கோப்புகளின் HTTP களஞ்சியம் போன்றவை). மீட்பு பயன்முறையில் நுழைவதற்கும் பயன்படுத்தலாம்.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: A full installation that contains the BaseOS and AppStream repositories and allows you to complete the installation without additional repositories. Installing Rocky from the DVD ISO is the easiest and most common method of performing a standard Rocky 8 installation.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: BaseOS மற்றும் AppStream களஞ்சியங்களைக் கொண்ட முழு நிறுவல் மற்றும் கூடுதல் களஞ்சியங்கள் இல்லாமல் நிறுவலை முடிக்க உங்களை அனுமதிக்கிறது. டிவிடி ஐஎஸ்ஓவிலிருந்து ராக்கி லினக்ஸை நிறுவுவது நிலையான ராக்கி லினக்ஸ் 8 நிறுவலைச் செய்வதற்கான எளிதான மற்றும் மிகவும் பொதுவான முறையாகும்.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Perguntas Frequentes"

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Below is a list of our most frequently asked questions.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: எங்கள் அடிக்கடி கேட்கப்படும் கேள்விகளின் பட்டியல் கீழே உள்ளது.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: How can I help mirror current and future Rocky Linux releases?
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: தற்போதைய மற்றும் எதிர்கால ராக்கி லினக்ஸ் வெளியீடுகளை எவ்வாறு பிரதிபலிக்க உதவுவது?

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Please email <0>mirrors@rockylinux.org</0> to express your interest.
I encountered a bug while testing Rocky Linux, what can I do?
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: ராக்கி லினக்ஸைச் சோதிக்கும்போது ஒரு பிழை ஏற்பட்டது, நான் என்ன செய்வது?

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: First, create an account using <0>Rocky Linux Account Services</0>, then head over to our <1>Bugzilla server</1> to report any bugs.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: First, create an account using <0>Rocky Linux Account Services</0>, then head over to our <1>Bugzilla server</1> to report any bugs.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Создайте аккаунт в <0>Службе учетных записей Rocky Linux</0>, затем перейдите на наш <1>сервер Bugzilla</1> и сообщите о найденной ошибке."

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: How can I get involved with the Testing Team?
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: How can I get involved with the Testing Team?

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Please join the <0>~Testing</0> channel on our Mattermost server to get started. There's also a testing topic on the forums for more durable conversation.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Please join the <0>~Testing</0> channel on our Mattermost server to get started. There's also a testing topic on the forums for more durable conversation.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Where can I find the latest news about Rocky Linux?
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Where can I find the latest news about Rocky Linux?
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Wo finde ich die aktuellen Neuigkeiten über Rocky Linux?"

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Stay tuned to our website, Twitter, LinkedIn, forums, and other platforms listed in our link directory for the latest announcements.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Stay tuned to our website, Twitter, LinkedIn, forums, and other platforms listed in our link directory for the latest announcements.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: How will you ensure that Rocky Linux truly remains a community enterprise operating system?
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: How will you ensure that Rocky Linux truly remains a community enterprise operating system?

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: First, we've taken steps to legally protect the Rocky Linux name. This means registering its trademarks and various associated properties to protect them from being controlled by another entity. We've achieved this by establishing them under the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation (RESF). Next, we've drafted a community charter that defines the organizational structure, objectives, values, and mission behind the legal entity that represents Rocky Linux. Critical in this charter is the establishment of principles that enable and protect the community: transparency, community involvement, open development, and independence. <0>Rocky Linux will never be controlled, purchased, or otherwise influenced by a single entity or organization.</0> Finally, we're architecting and deploying the necessary infrastructure to further enable to the community to contribute to Rocky Linux.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: First, we've taken steps to legally protect the Rocky Linux name. This means registering its trademarks and various associated properties to protect them from being controlled by another entity. We've achieved this by establishing them under the Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation (RESF). Next, we've drafted a community charter that defines the organizational structure, objectives, values, and mission behind the legal entity that represents Rocky Linux. Critical in this charter is the establishment of principles that enable and protect the community: transparency, community involvement, open development, and independence. <0>Rocky Linux will never be controlled, purchased, or otherwise influenced by a single entity or organization.</0> Finally, we're architecting and deploying the necessary infrastructure to further enable to the community to contribute to Rocky Linux.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Đầu tiên, chúng tôi đã thực hiện các thủ tục để bảo vệ pháp lý cho thương hiệu Rocky Linux. Điều này có nghĩa là chúng tôi thực hiện việc đăng ký bản quyền thương hiệu cũng như các thông tin liên quan khác để bảo vệ chúng khỏi bị kiểm soát bởi các pháp nhân khác. Chúng tôi thực hiện điều này dưới danh nghĩa của RESF. Bên cạnh đó, chúng tôi đã soạn thảo một bản công bố cho cộng đồng về cơ cấu của tổ chức, các mục tiêu, giá trị, và nhiệm vụ để đảm bảo các quyền cố hữu của cộng đồng: Tính minh bạch, tính độc lập, có sự tham gia của cộng đồng và được phát triển theo xu hướng mở. <0>Rocky Linux sẽ không bao giờ bị kiểm soát, bị mua lại, hay chịu sự chi phối của bất kì một cá nhân hay tổ chức nào.</0> Cuối cùng, chúng tôi đang xây dựng và triển khai các hệ thống cần thiết để cho phép cộng đồng đóng góp vào sự phát triển của Rocky Linux trong tương lai."
The current Japanese translation contains wrong markup. Check ALL <0> tags.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: What if I have feedback or my question wasn't answered here?
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: What if I have feedback or my question wasn't answered here?

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Please email us: <0>hello@rockylinux.org</0> and we'll get back to you as soon as we can.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Please email us: <0>hello@rockylinux.org</0> and we'll get back to you as soon as we can.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: ¿puede alguien decirme si se puede probar Rocky 9.2 desde un PC con Windows 7, utilizando un pendrive?, y de ser posible, ¿Que capacidad en Gb debería tener como mínimo el pendrive que utilice?
The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "以社群力量驅動的企業級 Linux"
The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Корпоративный Linux, путем сообщества."
The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Enterprise Linux, der Gemeinschaftsweg."

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Rocky Linux is an open-source enterprise operating system designed to be 100% bug-for-bug compatible with Red Hat Enterprise Linux<0>®</0>. It is under intensive development by the community.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Rocky Linux is an open-source enterprise operating system designed to be 100% bug-for-bug compatible with Red Hat Enterprise Linux<0>®</0>. It is under intensive development by the community.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Rocky Linux 是一款與 Red Hat Enterprise Linux<0>®</0> 錯誤相容的開放原始碼企業級作業系統，且正由社群頻繁開發中。"

The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Rocky Linux — это корпоративная операционная система с открытым исходным кодом, 100% совместимая с Red Hat Enterprise Linux<0>®</0>. Интенсивно разрабатывается сообществом."

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Rock solid, no matter the use-case.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Rock solid, no matter the use-case.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Rocky Linux rebuilds sources directly from RHEL<0>®</0>, so you can bet your best dollar that you'll have a super stable experience, no matter the use-case.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Rocky Linux rebuilds sources directly from RHEL<0>®</0>, so you can bet your best dollar that you'll have a super stable experience, no matter the use-case.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: Japanese translation contains wrong markup...

The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Rocky Linux baut die Quellen direkt von RHEL<0>®</0> neu auf, sodass Sie Ihren besten Euro wetten können, dass Sie eine super stabile Erfahrung erleben werden, unabhängig vom Anwendungsfall."

@resf The "<0>" tag is not properly closed in the Japanese translation. As a result, on the following page, it displays "Rocky Linux は RHEL®" (translates to "Rocky Linux is RHEL®" in English): https://rockylinux.org/ja/
The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Rocky Linux는 RHEL<0>®</0>에서 직접 소스를 재구축하므로 어떤 경우에 사용하든 상관없이 매우 안정적인 환경을 제공할 수 있습니다."

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Rocky Linux is enterprise-ready, providing solid stability with regular updates and a 10-year support lifecycle, all at no cost.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Rocky Linux is enterprise-ready, providing solid stability with regular updates and a 10-year support lifecycle, all at no cost.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Rocky Linux ist für den Unternehmenseinsatz geeignet und bietet solide Stabilität, regelmäßige Updates sowie einen 10-jährigen Support-Lebenszyklus, und das alles kostenlos."
The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "社區支援"
The current translation is mainland-China style, which is not suitable for "zh_TW".

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: The community, sponsors, and partners have invested with long-term commitments to ensure the project stays with the community.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: The community, sponsors, and partners have invested with long-term commitments to ensure the project stays with the community.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "社群、贊助者及合作夥伴已做出長期的投入承諾，確保該專案留在社群中。"

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Migrate from other Enterprise Linux distributions without sweating it. We provide an easy-to-use migration script, free of charge.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Migrate from other Enterprise Linux distributions without sweating it. We provide an easy-to-use migration script, free of charge.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "毋須費心從其他企業 Linux 發行版本遷移，我們免費提供易於使用的遷移指令稿。"
The current translation is mainland-China style, which is not suitable for "zh_TW".
The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Aktuelle Nachrichten"

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: We regularly share updates with the community about what's happening. Here's the latest.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: We regularly share updates with the community about what's happening. Here's the latest.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Stay up-to-date on the latest from Rocky Linux.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Stay up-to-date on the latest from Rocky Linux.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Partners of the RESF represent ongoing relationships of strategic importance to the Rocky Linux project. Through dedication of engineering expertise, infrastructure resources, or other means, their support is critical to our continued success and long term stability.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Partners of the RESF represent ongoing relationships of strategic importance to the Rocky Linux project. Through dedication of engineering expertise, infrastructure resources, or other means, their support is critical to our continued success and long term stability.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: 当前批准的译文有误，请审阅我的译文："RESF的合作伙伴代表着对 Rocky Linux 项目具有重要战略意义的持续关系。通过工程专业知识、基础设施资源或其他手段的奉献，他们的支持对我们的持续成功和长期稳定至关重要。"
Spaces are redundant

@jimcat8 Thank you for your review. Unfortunately, I can't understand Chinese. So, I may not have understood correctly what you pointed out. By the way, I translated the passage freely, instead of literally because of making it more natural Japanese. Would it be better to translate this sentence directly?

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: We believe in helping people do great things. This is why CIQ is a founding partner of the RESF. We provide commercial support and services for Rocky Linux to customers in research, academia, government, enterprise, partners, and everyone in between.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: We believe in helping people do great things. This is why CIQ is a founding partner of the RESF. We provide commercial support and services for Rocky Linux to customers in research, academia, government, enterprise, partners, and everyone in between.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Arm is committed to ensuring its architecture is a first-class citizen from day one with Rocky Linux. We have partnered with the RESF, providing dedicated engineering efforts to complement Rocky Linux development and testing teams, working closely together to test, validate, and support ARM now and long into the future.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Arm is committed to ensuring its architecture is a first-class citizen from day one with Rocky Linux. We have partnered with the RESF, providing dedicated engineering efforts to complement Rocky Linux development and testing teams, working closely together to test, validate, and support ARM now and long into the future.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Equinix is the world's digital infrastructure company. Digital leaders harness our trusted platform to bring together and interconnect the foundational infrastructure that powers their success.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Equinix is the world's digital infrastructure company. Digital leaders harness our trusted platform to bring together and interconnect the foundational infrastructure that powers their success.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Fastly's edge cloud platform enables customers to create great digital experiences quickly, securely, and reliably by processing, serving, and securing our customers' applications as close to their end-users as possible — at the edge of the internet.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Fastly's edge cloud platform enables customers to create great digital experiences quickly, securely, and reliably by processing, serving, and securing our customers' applications as close to their end-users as possible — at the edge of the internet.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Mattermost is an open source messaging solution made for organizations with the highest security requirements. As big believers in the power of open source, Mattermost is thrilled to partner with RESF to help bring an enterprise-grade distribution of Linux to the tech community.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Mattermost is an open source messaging solution made for organizations with the highest security requirements. As big believers in the power of open source, Mattermost is thrilled to partner with RESF to help bring an enterprise-grade distribution of Linux to the tech community.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: NAVER Cloud Platform is a South Korean cloud service that started in 2017 under NAVER Cloud, a subsidiary of NAVER. It provides over 170 individual services in 2021 and holds various security certifications including CSA STAR GOLD, GDPR, and more. It also currently provides cloud services in 10 locations around the world.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: NAVER Cloud Platform is a South Korean cloud service that started in 2017 under NAVER Cloud, a subsidiary of NAVER. It provides over 170 individual services in 2021 and holds various security certifications including CSA STAR GOLD, GDPR, and more. It also currently provides cloud services in 10 locations around the world.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: The Oregon State University Open Source Lab is a nonprofit organization working for the advancement of open source technologies. The OSL offers world-class hosting services, professional software development and on-the-ground training for promising students interested in open source management and programming.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: The Oregon State University Open Source Lab is a nonprofit organization working for the advancement of open source technologies. The OSL offers world-class hosting services, professional software development and on-the-ground training for promising students interested in open source management and programming.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: As a global leader in high performance, high-efficiency server technology, and innovation Supermicro is excited to work with the RESF and deliver data center servers and storage systems optimized for Rocky Linux.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: As a global leader in high performance, high-efficiency server technology, and innovation Supermicro is excited to work with the RESF and deliver data center servers and storage systems optimized for Rocky Linux.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: We would like to thank our sponsors for their support thus far on the project.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: We would like to thank our sponsors for their support thus far on the project.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: We believe in helping people do great things. This is why CIQ is a founding sponsor of the RESF. We provide commercial support and services for Rocky Linux to customers in research, academia, government, enterprise, partners, and everyone in between.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: We believe in helping people do great things. This is why CIQ is a founding sponsor of the RESF. We provide commercial support and services for Rocky Linux to customers in research, academia, government, enterprise, partners, and everyone in between.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation, as it could be more appropriate for the current context: "Creemos en ayudar a la gente a crear grandes cosas, por eso CIQ es un socio fundador del RESF. Proporcionamos apoyo comercial y servicios para Rocky Linux a clientes en los ámbitos de investigación, academia, gobierno, empresas, socios y todos en medio."

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: 45Drives offers enterprise storage solutions built on powerful and robust open-source software that allows customers to benefit from the cost savings & flexibility of off-the-shelf hardware. Check them out for a fully supported data storage solution at the best cost per terabyte!
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: 45Drives offers enterprise storage solutions built on powerful and robust open-source software that allows customers to benefit from the cost savings & flexibility of off-the-shelf hardware. Check them out for a fully supported data storage solution at the best cost per terabyte!

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: The RESF utilizes AWS to run much of the underlying infrastructure critical to the development and deployment of the services supporting Rocky Linux. From Koji builders for x86_64 and aarch64 running in EC2 to SRPM blob storage in S3, AWS is foundational to much of what we do.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: The RESF utilizes AWS to run much of the underlying infrastructure critical to the development and deployment of the services supporting Rocky Linux. From Koji builders for x86_64 and aarch64 running in EC2 to SRPM blob storage in S3, AWS is foundational to much of what we do.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: As a principal sponsor of the RESF, Google understands the importance of Rocky Linux as a free, open, community enterprise operating system. Providing resources for testing and validation, we've partnered with the RESF to ensure Rocky's status as a first-class citizen on the Google Cloud Platform from day one.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: As a principal sponsor of the RESF, Google understands the importance of Rocky Linux as a free, open, community enterprise operating system. Providing resources for testing and validation, we've partnered with the RESF to ensure Rocky's status as a first-class citizen on the Google Cloud Platform from day one.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Linux is the fastest growing platform on Azure, running in over half of VM cores. For well over a decade, Microsoft has been investing on Linux, and with partnerships being a central pillar of Microsoft's open source strategy we collaborate with RESF and the broader Rocky Linux ecosystem to ensure customers have an increasing set of options to deploy Linux workloads on Azure in a supported, managed and secure way.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Linux is the fastest growing platform on Azure, running in over half of VM cores. For well over a decade, Microsoft has been investing on Linux, and with partnerships being a central pillar of Microsoft's open source strategy we collaborate with RESF and the broader Rocky Linux ecosystem to ensure customers have an increasing set of options to deploy Linux workloads on Azure in a supported, managed and secure way.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:note: The currently approved translation is not correct, please review my translation: "Linux là nền tảng phát triển nhanh nhất trên Azure, đang chạy trên quá nửa các máy ảo của chúng tôi. Đã qua gần 1 thập kỷ Microsoft đầu tư nguồn lực cho Linux, và với định hướng trọng tâm về định hướng mã nguồn mở của Microsoft, chúng tôi hợp tác với RESF và rộng hơn nữa là hệ sinh thái Rocky Linux, để đảm bảo rằng khách hàng có nhiều sự lựa chọn hơn trong việc triển khai các hệ thống Linux trên Azure một cách dễ dàng, thân thiện và an toàn."

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: MontaVista Software is the leader in embedded commercial LInux, supporting MontaVista CGX, Yocto Project®️, CentOS and Rocky Linux. MontaVista offers Open Source Software expertise, commercial-quality Linux distros, cost-effective maintenance and support for 10+ year life-cycles.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: MontaVista Software is the leader in embedded commercial LInux, supporting MontaVista CGX, Yocto Project®️, CentOS and Rocky Linux. MontaVista offers Open Source Software expertise, commercial-quality Linux distros, cost-effective maintenance and support for 10+ year life-cycles.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: OpenDrives is a global provider of enterprise-scale, software-defined data storage solutions. Our technology is designed to power the most demanding workflows—on premises and in the cloud. Our commitment to open standards and protocols facilitates ease of integrations, making it simpler for customers to access, use, move, and protect their data. We are headquartered in Culver City, CA.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: OpenDrives is a global provider of enterprise-scale, software-defined data storage solutions. Our technology is designed to power the most demanding workflows—on premises and in the cloud. Our commitment to open standards and protocols facilitates ease of integrations, making it simpler for customers to access, use, move, and protect their data. We are headquartered in Culver City, CA.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Rakuten Symphony is a strong believer that open source communities encourage innovation through collaboration. Deployment of Rocky Linux represents a return to true open-source principles, powered by open communities. Rakuten Symphony is working closely with a broad spectrum of third-party vendors and technology partners within the telecom industry to make Rocky Linux the standard operating system for running large networks.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Rakuten Symphony is a strong believer that open source communities encourage innovation through collaboration. Deployment of Rocky Linux represents a return to true open-source principles, powered by open communities. Rakuten Symphony is working closely with a broad spectrum of third-party vendors and technology partners within the telecom industry to make Rocky Linux the standard operating system for running large networks.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: VMware is a leading provider of multi-cloud services for all apps, enabling digital innovation with enterprise control.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: VMware is a leading provider of multi-cloud services for all apps, enabling digital innovation with enterprise control.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Commercial support for Rocky Linux is available from these sponsors and partners, as well as other non-affiliated companies.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Commercial support for Rocky Linux is available from these sponsors and partners, as well as other non-affiliated companies.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: We believe in helping people do great things. This is why CIQ is a founding partner of the RESF. We provide commercial support and services for Rocky Linux to customers in research, academia, government, enterprise, partners, and everyone in between.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: We believe in helping people do great things. This is why CIQ is a founding partner of the RESF. We provide commercial support and services for Rocky Linux to customers in research, academia, government, enterprise, partners, and everyone in between.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: MontaVista has been building Linux distributions since 1999, and we have been behind some of the early contributions that made Linux what it is today. Our primary goal is making sure our customers are successful with their programs on the long term and provide commercial grade service level agreements for field support and long-term CVE maintenance on your exact product configuration.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: MontaVista has been building Linux distributions since 1999, and we have been behind some of the early contributions that made Linux what it is today. Our primary goal is making sure our customers are successful with their programs on the long term and provide commercial grade service level agreements for field support and long-term CVE maintenance on your exact product configuration.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: OpenLogic delivers comprehensive support services for open source software, so that your teams can enjoy the benefits of using open source — and confidently meet your requirements including compliance with regulations such as GDPR, HIPAA, and PCI.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: OpenLogic delivers comprehensive support services for open source software, so that your teams can enjoy the benefits of using open source — and confidently meet your requirements including compliance with regulations such as GDPR, HIPAA, and PCI.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: It appears that JavaScript is disabled in your browser. While most areas of this website work without the use of JavaScript, you may experience unintended experiences while browsing our site. Please consider making an exception for our site in your browser's settings.

A pesar de que la mayoría de las áreas de este sitio web funcionan sin el uso de JavaScript, usted puede experimentar comportamientos no intencionados mientras navega por nuestro sitio. Por favor, considere hacer una excepción para nuestro sitio en la configuración de su navegador."

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Linux® is the registered trademark of Linus Torvalds in the U.S. and other countries. Red Hat Enterprise Linux, RHEL and CentOS are trademarks or registered trademarks of Red Hat, Inc. or its subsidiaries in the US and other countries. We are not affiliated with, endorsed by or sponsored by Red Hat, Inc.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Linux® என்பது U.S. மற்றும் பிற நாடுகளில் Linus Torvalds இன் பதிவு செய்யப்பட்ட வர்த்தக முத்திரையாகும். Red Hat Enterprise Linux, RHEL மற்றும் CentOS ஆகியவை US மற்றும் பிற நாடுகளில் உள்ள Red Hat, Inc. அல்லது அதன் துணை நிறுவனங்களின் வர்த்தக முத்திரைகள் அல்லது பதிவு செய்யப்பட்ட வர்த்தக முத்திரைகள் ஆகும். நாங்கள் Red Hat, Inc உடன் இணைக்கப்படவில்லை, ஒப்புதல் அளிக்கவில்லை அல்லது ஸ்பான்சர் செய்யவில்லை.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: The RESF's most frequently asked questions.
